resources.string: This is Bob, he\'s a very awesome guy.
Press here for another awesome fact!

string-array.name: fun_facts
string-array.item: fun fact 2 is long long long long long long long long long long long long yeah really long
fun fact 4 likes to ramble on and on and on and more longer on for great long stretches of time and time again. One more time, everybody! music makes the people happy, clappy, and lappy as larry.
fun fact 8 could really use a hacker typewriter
fun fact 10 like to ramble on and on and on and more longer on for great long stretches of time and time again.
